reindex.title: Build Search Index
reindex.msg1: Please choose how you want to update the search index. There are two options available:
reindex.msg2: Build: Index all data without recreating.
reindex.msg3: Delete and build: Delete the existing search index and build a new one from scratch. Note: No search results will be available until the build process is over.

index.index-old: This index is outdated, as it was built <span am-time-ago='indexDate'>

permissions.search:index:rebuild: Enables deleting the search index and building it once again.
permissions.search:index:access: Enables access to the Search Index menu.

VirtoCommerce.Search.IndexingJobs.Enable.title: Schedule indexing jobs
VirtoCommerce.Search.IndexingJobs.Enable.description: Enable or disable regular search index builders

VirtoCommerce.Search.IndexingJobs.CronEx.title: Indexing job cron expression
VirtoCommerce.Search.IndexingJobs.CronEx.description: For X minutes, use '0/x * * * *'. For X hours, use '0 */x * * *'. You can also set X minutes as '15 */x * * *', and X days as '0 0 */x * *'.

VirtoCommerce.Search.IndexPartitionSize.title: Maximum item count per indexing partition
VirtoCommerce.Search.IndexPartitionSize.description: Providing high values may lead to slow performance
